languages.text: "Я — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус. По праву власти над Футфолом я аннулирую завещание пирата Денза Беллардо и конфискую все его состояние".

"I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."
languages.original_text: "Я — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус. По праву власти над Футфолом я аннулирую завещание пирата Денза Беллардо и конфискую все его состояние".

traits.locale_text: "I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius. By my right of authority on Footfall, I hereby void the will left by the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscate his fortune in its entirety."
"I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius. By my right of authority on Footfall, I hereby void the will left by the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscate his fortune in its entirety."

"I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

"I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

"I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

languages.text: “我是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，我拥有对落脚港的全部管辖权。我在此行使这一权力。我宣布，海盗丹兹·贝拉多的遗嘱无效，我在此将其财产全部没收。”
languages.original_text: "I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

traits.locale_text: “我是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，我拥有对落脚港的全部管辖权。我在此行使这一权力。我宣布，海盗丹兹·贝拉多的遗嘱无效，我在此将其财产全部没收。”

languages.text: «Soy {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, y como tal estoy dotad{mf|o|a} de autoridad absoluta en Paso. Por la presente, y ejerciendo dicha autoridad, anulo el testamento del pirata Denz Bellardo y confisco la totalidad de su fortuna».
languages.original_text: "I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

traits.locale_text: «Soy {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, y como tal estoy dotad{mf|o|a} de autoridad absoluta en Paso. Por la presente, y ejerciendo dicha autoridad, anulo el testamento del pirata Denz Bellardo y confisco la totalidad de su fortuna».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ。従って、{mf|俺|私}はフットフォールに関する全権を与えられている。その権限を行使し、海賊デンツ・ベラルドの遺言を無効とし、彼の財産を全額没収する」
languages.original_text: "I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ。従って、{mf|俺|私}はフットフォールに関する全権を与えられている。その権限を行使し、海賊デンツ・ベラルドの遺言を無効とし、彼の財産を全額没収する」

languages.text: "Ich bin {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius und genieße in dieser Funktion die uneingeschränkte Autorität auf Footfall. Ich erkläre hiermit im Rahmen dieser Autorität das Testament des Piraten Denz Bellardo für ungültig und konfisziere sein gesamtes Vermögen."
languages.original_text: "I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius und genieße in dieser Funktion die uneingeschränkte Autorität auf Footfall. Ich erkläre hiermit im Rahmen dieser Autorität das Testament des Piraten Denz Bellardo für ungültig und konfisziere sein gesamtes Vermögen."

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|investi|investie} d'une autorité suprême sur Castel. Je décrète donc le testament du pirate Denz Bellardo nul et non avenu, et je confisque l'intégralité de sa fortune. »
languages.original_text: "I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|investi|investie} d'une autorité suprême sur Castel. Je décrète donc le testament du pirate Denz Bellardo nul et non avenu, et je confisque l'intégralité de sa fortune. »

languages.text: "Ben Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius, bundan sebep de Binliman'da tam yetkiye sahibim. Bu yetkiyi, korsan Denz Bellardo'nun vasiyetini hükümsüz kılmak ve tüm mal varlığına el koymak için kullanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as such, I am vested with complete authority on Footfall. I hereby exercise that authority by voiding the will of the pirate Denz Bellardo and confiscating his fortune in its entirety."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius. Binliman'da tam yetkiye sahibim. Bu yetkiyi, korsan Denz Bellardo'nun vasiyetini hükümsüz kılmak ve tüm mal varlığına el koymak için kullanıyorum."
